Body: I have a problem with the broadcast cell, I don't stop receiving messages! I'm going crazy! I found some solutions here in the forum but they did not work. I tried to kill the application through the terminal, but I can not use the command "su" (Not Found), and the messages come back in five minutes. Is there any app that freezes the application without using su? How do I install another ROM without root access? Why is su not found? Any solution that works. I can not stand these messages. Thank you, guys.
Title: Constantly receiving cell broadcast messages

history.Text: Good afternoon. I have a problem with the broadcast cell, I did not stop receiving messages! I'm going crazy! I found some solutions here in the forum but did not work, I tried to kill the application through the terminal, but I can not use the command "su" (Not Found), and the messages back in five minutes. Is there any app that freezes the application without using su? How do I install another ROM without root access? Why su is not found? Any solution that works. I can not stand these messages: / Thank you, guys.

history.Comment: Improved title. Removed greeting. Corrected spelling and grammar.
